#include <bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;
typedef long long ll;
vector <char> v;

int main(){
		ll n;
		scanf("%lld", &n);
		ll m = n;
		n = abs(n);
		v.clear();
		while(n>0){
			if(n%3 == 0){
				v.push_back('0');
			}else if((n+1)%3 == 0){
				v.push_back('-');
				n++;
			}else{
				v.push_back('|');
				n--;
			}
			n/=3;
		}
		if(m>=0){
			for(ll i = ((int)v.size()) -1; i>= 0; i--){
				printf("%c", v[i]);
			}
		}else{
			for(ll i = ((int)v.size()) -1; i>= 0; i--){
				if(v[i]=='|') printf("%c", '-');
				if(v[i]=='-') printf("%c", '|');
				if(v[i]=='0') printf("%c", '0');
			}
		}
		printf("\n");
}
